class.rdfs:comment: The action that takes in a math expression and directs users to a page potentially capable of solving/simplifying that expression.
class.rdfs:label: SolveMathAction

schema:eduQuestionType.rdfs:comment: For questions that are part of learning resources (e.g. Quiz), eduQuestionType indicates the format of question being given. Example: "Multiple choice", "Open ended", "Flashcard".
schema:eduQuestionType.rdfs:label: eduQuestionType
